Description:
Model
Brand: MSI
Series: Optix
Model: G2412
Part Number: G2412
Cabinet Color: Metallic Black


Display
Screen Size: 24" (23.8" Viewable)
Widescreen: Yes
Glare Screen: Non-glare
Panel: IPS
Display Type: FHD
Adaptive Sync Technology: FreeSync Premium (AMD Adaptive Sync)
Recommended Resolution: 1920 x 1080
Viewing Angle: 178° (H) / 178° (V)
Aspect Ratio: 16:9
Brightness: 250 cd/m2
Contrast Ratio: 3000:1
Response Time: 1ms (MPRT) / 4ms (GTG)
Color Gamut: 86.52% Adobe RGB / 81.64% DCI-P3 / 102.58% sRGB
Display Colors: 16.7 Million
Pixel Pitch: 0.271mm
Refresh Rate: 170 Hz
Curved Surface Screen: Flat Panel


Connectivity
Video Ports: 2 x HDMI (Supports FHD@144Hz as specified in HDMI 1.4b)
1 x DP (Supports FHD@170Hz as specified in DisplayPort 1.2a with overclocking)


Power
Power Consumption: Power On: 45W
Power Saving/Off: <0.5W


Convenience
Stand Adjustments: Tilt: -5° ~ 20°
VESA Compatibility - Mountable: 100 x 100mm
Features: IPS Panel - Optimize screen colors and brightness to enhance your viewing experience.
170Hz Refresh Rate - Respond faster with smoother frames.
1ms Response Time - Eliminate screen tearing and choppy frame rates.
Wide Color Gamut - Game colors and details will look more realistic and refined.
Night Vision - Smart black tuner to brighten your day by bringing out the fine details in dark areas.
AMD FreeSync Technology - Prevent screen tearing or stuttering, producing ultra-smooth lag-free gameplay.
Night Vision - Smart black tuner to brighten your day by bringing out the fine details in dark areas.
Frameless design - Enjoy the ultimate gaming experience with super narrow bezels.
Anti-Flicker and Less Blue Light - Game even longer and prevent eye strain and fatigue.
178° Wide Viewing Angle - Colors and details will stay sharp at more angles with a 178° wide viewing angle.


Dimensions & Weight
Dimensions (H x W x D): 17.80" x 21.27" x 8.98" w/ stand
14.15" x 21.27" x 2.40" w/o stand
Weight: 7.34 lbs.


Packaging
Package Contents: Power Cord, HDMI Cable


Consumer Alert
Consumer Alert: Display Port: 1920 x 1080 (Up to 170Hz)
HDMI: 1920 x 1080 (Up to 144Hz)

Adobe RGB, DCI-P3 and sRGB follow CIE1976 Standard
Label: Monitor MSI 24" G2412
